alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 17 at 3:45AM AKST until February 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Expect wind chills as cold as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may reduce the visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of very cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create dangerously low wind chill values. Frost bite can occur quickly and even hypothermia or death if precautions are not taken.
